item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, September 11, 2024 at 12:30 PM UTC
item.description:

27. Going open-source as a VC-Backed company (116 points | 57 comments)
28. A good day to trie-hard: saving compute 1% at a time (537 points | 154 comments)
29. What is the best pointer tagging method? (82 points | 12 comments)
